CustomField.description: GeoResults assigned number indicating the relative position for this business location east or west of the Prime Meridian at Greenwich, England. Paired with the latitude for this business location, the coordinates can be used to determine relative distances to network elements, assignments to standard geographic areas and assignments to standard telecommunications areas for this business. Longitude is given in degrees to six decimal places.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: GeoResults assigned number indicating the relative position for this business location east or west of the Prime Meridian at Greenwich, England.
CustomField.label: Longitude
